alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Adams, northwestern Garfield and central Whitman Counties through 830 AM PDT... At 759 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northeast of Delaney, or 29 miles west of Pullman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colfax, Endicott, Dusty, Winona, Revere, Benge, La Crosse, and Diamond. This includes U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 35 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
